data.name: Erannorth Reborn
data.detailed_description:
Erannorth Reborn is Rogue-like, Deck Building RPG game. You take the role of a supernatural creature (or a human with supernatural abilities), as he or she struggles to survive through the relentless pursuit of the Order of Light.

  • Create your character by mixing the different attributes and abilities of your Race (Human, Vampire, Lycanthrope & Demon) with those of your Class (Mercenary, Shadow, Hunter, Animist, Exorcist, Necromancer & Witch)

  • Customize your Deck anytime, freely, by Adding and Removing Racial & Class skills, Actions you find in Forgotten Grimoires and Consumable Items.

  • Use different Card combinations to overcome distinctive enemies with different Damage type resistances and vulnerabilities.

  • Hundreds of Action Cards composed by dozens of unique effects. Each Race & Class combination will give you new and unique ways to deal with your obstacles.

  • Upgrade your Cards to stronger versions simply by using them.

  • Grind that respects your time: Earn incrementally more Tokens to Unlock new Races & Classes each time you defeat a Boss and as you survive through the various stages. Permanently gain Mastery with a Race or Class & unlock new Skills, each time you defeat a Boss and as you survive through the various stages. You'll never feel that your run was for nothing.

  • Modding Support: Edit every Card & Enemy to your liking, the Class & Race features, and even Add your Own Enemies & Action Cards simply by editing human readable text files and combining pre-scripted effects.

data.short_description: Erannorth Reborn is Rogue-like, Deck Building RPG game. You take the role of a supernatural creature (or a human with supernatural abilities), as he or she struggles to survive through the relentless pursuit of the Order of Light.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains references to fantasy drugs (herbal infusions, potions etc.), alcohol & nudity. Some artworks of characters, cards & enemies may contain partial or full nudity.
